channel.title: Comments on: Beyond Berlin: London and other transplants
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max
item.dc:creator: Max
item.description: So many feels on this, Kells. This is a key element of this 'transplant' experience that rarely gets put in the spotlight. Thanks for doing that.
item.content:encoded: So many feels on this, Kells. This is a key element of this ‘transplant’ experience that rarely gets put in the spotlight. Thanks for doing that.
